description: Scoring configuration for item selection algorithm

item_count_mismatch.description: Penalty per missing item when we can't match friend's item count
item_count_mismatch.notes: If friend has 10 items but we only offer 8, penalty = 2 * 10 = 20 points

optimal_ratio_exceeded.description: Penalty per 0.025 exceeded beyond the optimal ratio threshold
optimal_ratio_exceeded.notes: If ratio is 0.175 (0.05 over optimal 0.125), penalty = 2 * 20 = 40 points

ak47.description: Bonus points for each AK-47 included

awp.description: Bonus points for each AWP included

knife.description: Bonus points for each knife included

gloves.description: Bonus points for each gloves included

diversity.notes: Applied per unique weapon type category (rifle/sniper/pistol/smg/knife/gloves)

optimal_ratio.description: Optimal value ratio (items to give / items to receive)
optimal_ratio.notes: 12.5% - ideal target for profitability. Penalties apply when exceeded.

minimum_ratio.description: Minimum required value ratio for base account checking
minimum_ratio.notes: 12.5% (1/8) - used to determine if we have enough inventory for trade

maximum_ratio.description: Maximum allowed value ratio (items to give / items to receive)
maximum_ratio.notes: 30% - hard limit. Any strategy exceeding this automatically fails.

high_value_trade.description: Threshold for considering a trade as high-value
high_value_trade.notes: Trades with friend value >= $100 are considered high-value

max_unique_items.description: Maximum number of unique items to select
max_unique_items.notes: Upper limit for number of different items in offer

max_popular_replacements.description: Maximum number of replacements in POPULAR_N strategy
max_popular_replacements.notes: Limits iterations when replacing non-popular items with popular ones

prefer_cheaper_items.description: Whether to prefer cheaper items in normal trades
prefer_cheaper_items.notes: For non-high-value trades, sort by price ascending

prefer_well_stocked_items.description: Whether to prefer items with higher quantity
